    About me

    He was a PhD student of University of New South Wales from 2016 to 2019, majoring in computer science, under the supervision of Lina Yao, Xiwei Xu and Liming Zhu. He has submitted PhD thesis. During his PhD study, he interned at Amazon AI Lab (Mentor: Aston Zhang) and Tencent. He received a Bachelor degree in 2014 from Nanjing University, majoring in information system. His research interests include but not limited to recommender systems, knowledge graph, and deep learning. He is PC member and reviewer for a number of top conferences and journals.

    He is the creator of the following open source projects:

    DeepRec
